landing.about: I make web-apps tailored for any client's needs.
landing.bio: As a currently freelancing full-stack developer, I specialize in developing small-scale applications. I find my ground working with servers and databases in Node.js just as well as when designing seamless and intuitive experiences on the front-end working with ReactJs. Working with clients, I've gathered experience in turning wishes into reality both through code and through personalized UI designs.

mobileText.line_1: My name is Ignacy and I'm a freelancing full-stack web developer.
mobileText.line_2: My main stack is Node.js and React w/ various UI frameworks.
mobileText.line_3: I'm experienced in working with clients turning wishes into reality through code and personalized UI designs fit according to my clients' needs.
